summary:
Improved arrow key movement configuration files.
Better and easier keyboard setup and  menu navigation.
(arrow keys only!)
descriptionHtml:
Info:
This is a optimated keyboard configuration file for arrow key movement.
It was made on a german Windows version but it should work at least for all euopean keyboards(codes).
The files does (of course) NOT work with the WSAD setup. (also may not work well on american workstations)
Main feature is the central Backspace key.
Which is used to open the Game Menu/Quests and for closing ALL other ingame windows/menus.
(There was another similiar configuration on here but it wouldnt let me close ALL menus)
You can also close pretty much every menu by clicking the assigned button again.
I suggest you to rebind the run/move toggle inside the game. (close to enter-key works best for me)
Feel free to switch Jump/Sneak key if u like. (aslong the game wont let you sprintjump, the right-ctrl jump seems the best for me)

Installation:
Copy EVERYTHING from the \"The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\" folder to your game directory and overwrite the files. (make a Backup!)

Deinstallation:
Remove the copied files (will reset your keyboard configuration!)

Default Bindings:

Left attack = Left Mouse
Right attack = Right Mouse
Shout = MiddleMouse (no keyboard assigned)
Scrolling/Camera = Mousewheel

Movement = Arrow Keys
Jump/Item Zoom = R-CTRL
Sprint = R-Shift
Activate = Enter
Sneak/locate = Numpad 0
Run/Walk = # (german & british keys) /may have to be remapped in the american Version
Ready Weapon = Page Down
Favorites = Delete
Items	 = Insert
Spells	 = Pageup
Journal/Quest = Home (pos1)
Map = End
Auto-Move = Numpad Decimal (comma)
QuickMenu	 = Numpad Enter
Talents/perks = Numpad Minus
Menus On/off = Backspace (Back-Key)
Change POV = Numpad plus
Wait Menu = Numpad / (divide)

Quick Use 1-8 = Numpad 1-8

Notes/bugs:
print/pause/quicksave are untouched.
Enter will open local map in the map menu, numpad 0 will center the view, journal button will switch to quests.
Sprint(r-shift) will charge magic items.
Sheat/unsheat weapon will drop the weapon when in a menu, \"delete\" will favorite it.
Some keys like the give/take command (numpad 2) and tabswitch (numpad 5+8) are incorrectly hardcoded, so unfortunatly i can\'t edit them.
May not work well on american workstations (diffrent key codes)
Enjoy!!

the god\'s have spoken..
redninja aka Sal Islam (nord)
author: redninja
